p: A device called Microalgae-microbial fuel cell (m-MFC) integrated process has been developed to overcome the problem of fossil-fuel depletion and environmental pollution by generating electrical energy from wastewater and sunlight, wastewater treatment, CO 2 sequestration and biomass production in single, self-sustainable technology [ 296, 297]. Table 9 showed microalgae used in the remediation of the pollutants present in the wastewater.
